nodes.text: Ice images was a type of Force power developed by the Doomed—the descendants of stranded Jedi and Dark Jedi on the planet Kesh. Ice images enabled members of the community to witness events occurring in other regions of the planet. This enabled them to monitor the Lost Tribe of Sith and helped them to learn about the planet's fauna including uvaks, a winged reptilian species used as steeds. In 2974 BBY, the leader of the Doomed Kaliska revealed to the Sith princess Takara Hilts that this Force ability had allow them to observe developments in the regions ruled by the Tribe.
